txt.en: The Abyss of Mordath: The Master of the Seven -- Tier 1

King Váskmun Greytooth has come to the Mordath seeking the lost Dwarf-ring, Manthríf, and will stop at nothing to reclaim it. However, the fates of the Seven are shrouded in great secrecy and terrible truths shall soon be revealed.
Prevent King Váskmun Greytooth from recovering Manthríf

King Váskmun Greytooth has come to the Mordath seeking the lost Dwarf-ring, Manthríf, and will stop at nothing to reclaim it. However, the fates of the Seven are shrouded in great secrecy and terrible truths shall soon be revealed.
You have defeated Fingar the Greedy, a great Worm of Angband in the depths of the Mordath. As King Váskmun Greytooth's greed led only to his doom, the true fate of Manthríf remains unknown.
